description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Say hello to Retro Racer Combat, our little love letter to the classic 8-bit racing combat genre.  Race through 6 different levels, avoiding traffic and taking down the level bosses with your cannons.  Created by Paul Marrable  With music from Dylan Barry
description.short: Say hello to Retro Racer Combat, our little love letter to the classic 8-bit racing combat genre.  Race through 6 different levels, avoiding traffic and taking down the level bosses with your cannons.  Created by Paul Marrable  With music from Dylan Barry
